titleStmt.title: Dauids pastorall poeme: or sheepeheards song Seuen sermons, on the 23. Psalme of Dauid, whereof the last was preached at Ashford in Kent, the day whereon our gracious King was there proclaimed. By Thomas Iackson preacher of Gods word at Wie in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, d. 1646.
Swan, John, student in divinity.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, and are to bee sold by Edmund Weauer at his shop at the great north doore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
S3-7 contain "To the Christian reader", signed by the editor, John Swan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the great north doore of Paules Church
